title: Remix-Based Creativity Assessment Design in Media Production Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic media production skills and experience with digital editing tools
context.additional_context: Short-term intensive course utilizing a mobile learning platform accessible via personal devices. Emphasizes creative problem-solving skills in environments resembling real industry cases

learning_goals: Learners can explain creative approaches to reinterpret existing media content using remix techniques
Learners can produce innovative hybrid works in terms of genre, technology, and content
Learners can analyze and improve creativity elements in the media production process based on peer feedback
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
